definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
the Apollo project (1961-1975), the NASA moon landing project

sentences.english: Advanced Aeronautics booster color changes for Apollo and Carrier Drones.
sentences.chinese: 先進航空學將會改變阿波羅和艦載機的加速器顏色。

sentences.english: Appollo stood for youth and manly beauty.
sentences.chinese: 阿波羅象徵着青春和陽剛之美。
阿波羅的第一個情人是黛芙妮。

sentences.english: If you are Dafne, I'm your Apollo.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是達芙妮，我就是你的阿波羅。

sentences.english: He shot Apollo with a golden arrow through the heart, causing him to fall madly in love with Daphne.
sentences.chinese: 穿過阿波羅心臟的是金箭，使他瘋狂地愛上了達佛涅。

sentences.english: Scene changed to Ishida and Apollo.
sentences.chinese: 場面轉到雨龍和阿波羅。

sentences.english: In this city is one of the most revered temples, that of Apollo.
sentences.chinese: 阿波羅神廟是這座城市裏最受敬仰的神廟之一。

sentences.english: "Daphne" is a nymph who metamorphosed into a laurel tree as a means of escaping from Apollo.
sentences.chinese: 達芙妮就是爲逃避阿波羅而變成一顆月桂樹的女神。

sentences.english: A long time ago, Apollo was the god of light.
sentences.chinese: 很久以前，阿波羅是太陽神，伊洛斯是愛神。

sentences.english: The god Apollo, however, knew of Achilles’ weak spot and told Paris about it.
sentences.chinese: 然而阿波羅神卻知道阿奇里斯的弱點並告訴了帕里斯。

sentences.english: The 5th century BC Doric Temple of Apollo at the site of Ancient Corinth.
sentences.chinese: 公元前5世紀多利安寺在古代科林斯網站阿波羅。
阿波羅11號指令艙，命名爲哥倫比亞。

sentences.english: Arsenius drove like he was piloting Apollo One.
sentences.chinese: 阿森紐斯彷彿在駕駛阿波羅一號。

sentences.english: What was your father's perspective on Apollo 11?
sentences.chinese: 你父親對阿波羅11號的看法是什麼？

sentences.english: Daphne was pursued by Apollo and was at last changed into a laurel tree.
sentences.chinese: 達夫尼被阿波羅窮追不捨，最後被變成一棵桂樹。

definition: El Niño (meteorology)/Holy Infant (cf biblical nativity story)
Wanluan township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
to amaze the world with a single brilliant feat (idiom); an overnight celebrity
